EmailTemplate.name: Entities Creation Alert
EmailTemplate.subject: New Entity "{!Account.Name}" Created in Advisor Factory
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Team,
There is a new Entity created in Advisor Factory.
{!Account.OwnerFirstName} is the owner of the Entity "{!Account.Name}".
Please followup with {!Account.OwnerFirstName} to get the details so that you can incorporate them onto the Advisor Factory.
Thank You,
Ffreedom Team.
